message in group oc_test_group: @orchestrator status

Conversation info (untrusted metadata):
```json
{
  "conversation_label": "oc_test_group",
  "sender": "tester",
  "message_id": "__MESSAGE_ID__",
  "was_mentioned": true
}
```

Sender (untrusted metadata):
```json
{
  "name": "Test User",
  "sender_type": "user"
}
```

Card callback (untrusted metadata):
```json
{
  "open_message_id": "__MESSAGE_ID__",
  "action": {
    "tag": "button",
    "value": {
      "command": "__COMMAND__",
      "message_id": "__MESSAGE_ID__",
      "action_ts": "__ACTION_TS__"
    }
  }
}
```
